fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this role would roll, the player who would roll it gets a new role and the host is added to the game as a player with this role as well as the host. This is publicly announced in the player list channel. The player never sees that they would've gotten this role.
- You may not whisper or talk in any chats or send any messages whatsoever or have a last will or vote.
- Investigative abilities against you fail.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Send a vision to someone each night, revealing to them a player of your choice's role as if you were 328: Divine Visionary, but you may choose to change the role revealed to whatever you like.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose the game.
